 ∙ Ensure mobilisation of beneficiaries to avail services during PMSMA.
 ∙ Ensure that those high-risk pregnant women who have been referred to higher level centre during the previous 
PMSMA, visit the higher centre for management and treatment of the complications.
2.2 Antenatal Assessment and its Components 
Essential Components of Antenatal Care
 ∙ Early registration (Refer Section 2.4)
 ∙ History taking
